Text:
PLEASE SEEDDDDD

PLZ AND THANKYOU I HAD THIS GAME AND LOVED IT THEN LOST IT SO I REALLLLLLY REALLY WANT IT !
how do i burn the cd? I installed the game and when i try to play it it asks for a cd but i dont know what to burn onto one...
I can easily seed up to 1 mb/s...but someone needs to make sure i can download this game ;)

I'm getting....

"This application has failed to start because d3drm.dll was not found. Re-installing the application may fix the problem."

lil help?

@Highspot

you need to download a replacement file from here:
http://www.d3drmdll.com/downloads/d3drm.zip

extract it, and then put the .dll in the c:/windows/system32 folder, along with all the other .dll files. 

mine is working fine now.
